summary:
Dushnikh Yal is one of the major orc strongholds located close to Markarth. There are already a couple of merchants, trainers and a potential follower.
This mod just adds a couple small things to the stronghold, making it the perfect player home imho.
descriptionHtml:
Dushnikh Yal - Warrior Player Home
===========================================================================

What it does:

Dushnikh Yal is one of the major orc strongholds located close to Markarth. There are already a couple of merchants, trainers and a potential follower.
This mod just adds a couple small things to the stronghold, making it the perfect player home imho.
You  have to become bloodkin with the orcs to be allowed to enter the stronghold. You get the key to the house from Ghorbash Iron Hand. Just make him a follower and take the key from his inventory.
In the house you\'ll find a trap-door to the cellar, which is your hidden hideout...

Changes:

- added player-owned beds to the house, cellar and one of the watchtowers.
- added player-owned chests to the blacksmith and the cellar.
- added new ingredients to the alchemist.
- added new armor to the blacksmith.
- added a panbroker to the cellar.
- added a new follower.
- much more - just explore the place...


============================================================================

Install:
-	Copy file to skyrim/Data folder manually or via mod-manager.
-	Activate file via launcher or mod-manager.

Update:
-	Deactivate old file via launcher or mod-manager.
-	Delete old file from skyrim/Data folder manually or via mod-manager.
-	Copy new file to skyrim/Data folder manually or via mod-manager.
-	Activate new file via launcher or mod-manager.


Uninstall
-	Deactivate file via launcher or mod-manager.
-	Delete file from skyrim/Data folder manually or via mod-manager.

=============================================================================

Please endorse it if you like it.

Joe 3:16
author: Joe316
